name: Present Penguin
description:
I know penguins don't live in the north pole but I wanted to draw one ok?
This game was heavily inspired by Hotline Miami.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Left click - throw snowball
  • Middle mouse button - lock onto enemies
  • Shift - look ahead

Stuff I used:

  • Music - Frozeth by DSTechnician
  • Cartoony whooshes by BranRainey
  • 8-bit FX by SampleScience
  • Font - Pixeltype by TheJman0205
